about_the_game:
Experience the perks of being a Founding member of the Iron Orchestra! Secure your Founder’s Pack to support the revolution, and instantly unlock exclusive items and customizations for your Zorans. With the Founder’s Pack, you’ll get instant access to the new Zoran skin, Magma, along with more skins, weapon wraps, NOVA, attachments, emotes, executions, and holograms. Every Founder’s Pack grants 5000 NOVA Credits and a special Rave variant of the popular Pacho & Chickenito. Plus, you’ll get 2 executions only available during Early Access: "Get Verified" and "Mr. Likeable"!



PACK CONTENTS:

5000 NOVA Credits
3 Zorans (robot) skins:
- Magma
- Moto Contrast
- New Midian Police Dept.
2 Hologram chips:
- Rave Pacho & Chickenito
- N30N Bounty Huntress
4 Attachments:
- Electron Charge Pack
- Samurai Hat
- Skull Punk Cap
- Headphones
Winter Weapon Wrap set
2 Executions:
- Get Verified
- Mr. Likeable
2 Emotes:
- Whip It
- Crank It



IMPORTANT: The Founders Pack can only be purchased once per account.

name: RoboSquad Revolution: Founder's Pack
short_description: Experience the perks of being a Founding member of the Iron Orchestra! Secure your Founder’s Pack to support the revolution and instantly unlock exclusive items. You’ll get instant access to skins, weapon wraps, NOVA, attachments, emotes, executions and holograms, including the new Zoran skin Magma.
